website_summaries.verdict: Sharp-looking smartphone case that absorbs shock using an air cushion technology design.
pros: Does not hinder wireless charging capabilities
Includes a raised lip around the screen that protects it from scratches
Uses a carbon fiber texture that gives you a perfect level of grip
cons: Will not protect against drops from height

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Spigen Rugged Armor for all my past phones. So when I got an iPhone XS, getting this was one of the first things I ordered. Needless to say I was disappointed when it arrived and it clearly is not designed for the XS but just the X. The bottom cutout is not right and same with the rear camera cutout. The XS rear camera is slightly wider than the X, so it doesn’t work! Come on Spigen. What happened to you...
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bourne

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and a great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of Spigen cases for a while now and for good reason. They're functional, they fit perfectly and they look good. This case is no exception. I didn't want a bulky case to protect my $1000. phone liability. The whole reason of the iPhone X is too have a bigger screen in a smaller phone otherwise you'd just get the 8+. The texture of this case makes it grippable and the edges of the face are raised so that the screen protector doesn't even touch when the phone is placed face down. I have dropped the phone several times now and no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t protect iPhone X
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case because it was highly recommended and claimed to be tough while protecting my phone. I’d had the same case on my iPhone X for two years. It was coming apart, but had always protected my phone from damage. One week in, I dropped my phone on a carpeted floor and now the screen is damaged. I should’ve stuck with Otterbox. I learned an expensive lesson. Don’t buy this case if you ever drop your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Triggerman

customer_reviews.title: Fits the iPhone X perfectly and adds good drop protection
customer_reviews.text: Nice snug fit on the iPhone X. Adds rubber drop protection. At first I was worried that the bumper would impede with the iPhone X’s gestures but this case does not. There is a slight “lip” since it adds screen protection when laying the device on the screen. The only con is this case covers the beautiful glass back + shell of the iPhone X, but that’s a trade off I was willing to do for drop protection. Also unsure if this case will interfere with wireless charging. The official Apple cases do not.
customer_reviews.author: P120D1GY

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been a Otter Box guy, but ordered this before getting my phone to give it a try. I am rough with my phone and after a month this case is standing up to my abuse. There is enough of a edge on the front to protect my glass screen protector and is light and thin enough so it isn’t bulky like a lot of the 2 piece cases are.
customer_reviews.author: Ry Guy

customer_reviews.title: very slippery
customer_reviews.text: This case is very nice. The bottom cutouts for the speakers do not exactly line up, but that isn't a huge deal. The problem for me is this case (and just about every other case i can find for the iphone xs) is slippery! If you get this case, i suggest getting a finger ring to install on the back of it to keep from dropping the phone. Why do manufacturers not make the cases textured or not slippery? It drives me insane. It's like they want you to drop your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Different texture than I’m used to, but still grippy
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned after reading other reviews that this would slip out of my hands all the time, but bought it anyways. It does have a different texture than other Spigen cases I’d purchased for previous iPhones, but I don’t mind it. It’s more of a soft plastic feel. If you just try to use your fingers on the back of the phone, it’ll slip out of your hand. But if you hold the sides (as most people do), there’s no problem with it feeling slippery. The case fits my Xs very snug as well.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Keller

customer_reviews.title: Thin, protective, reliable
customer_reviews.text: This case rules. I have strictly used Spigen cases for the last 4-5 years as they generally hold up well, and protect phones exceptionally well. The cases tend to outlast my phones - but when I go to trade then phone in to Verizon, it’s always in good shape. This case has worked particularly well for me with a pop socket on the back of it. The case has been married to a pop socket for about 7 months and both the case and the pop socket are in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Silky Cool iPhone X Cover
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover. Dropped phone already 5 times (klutz) from over 2 feet - and not a scratch. Also has a very cool sophisticated look when its on the table next to your Tall Latte. I like the back hatch for Apple logo and the silky feel - not too smooth but just right. Big departure from my usual heavier covers. Big plus as well, makes the phone much easier to place in pocket.
customer_reviews.author: MIZZE Made for Luck

customer_reviews.title: Slim and feels well engineered
customer_reviews.text: I actually own this case for my iPhone X. I’m posting because I don’t want this product overlooked because of fake reviews on other cases. It’s lightweight and the texture is smooth with decent grip. The phone fits well and the volume and power buttons don’t feel cheapened. They maintain a solid click unlike other cases I’ve used. I like that the lip around the screen is high enough that if the phone drops, the glass screen won’t be the first thing impacted. I’ve already had this lip help a few times. It also doesn’t prevent the phone from being used with a wireless charger. Overall a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Elder

customer_reviews.title: Spigen won the battle of the cases..again
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a bunch of cases to see which one works best. I’ve been a Spigen fan for 6 years. They’re Neohybrid case made my 5s survive 6 years without a scratch and any cracks in my screen, even after falling on asphalt, tile, concrete and even once thrown against a wall in frustration (not caused by the phone LOL). So I knew what I wanted, and the Spigen won again, feeling like it’s going to offer the best protection. I chose this model because it felt like the slimmest to me. So far, one drop on bathroom tile, face down, all good!
customer_reviews.author: Gude A.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, high level protection for a mid level Spigen protection case.
customer_reviews.text: Best Spigen design so far got the iPhone X on the day it came out and been using this case ever since. I am very prone to breaking my phone screens and so far it has done a great job. For the Spigen line this is mid level protection but it is great. I don’t care for wireless charging so I put a magnetic plate in between the case, but when I have access to a wireless charger I always try and it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: I have this case on my IPhone 7 Plus and absolutely love. It’s not bulky at all and gives the ...
customer_reviews.text: I plan on buying the iPhone X when it’s released so I decided to be a little proactive and buy a case for it. I have this case on my IPhone 7 Plus and absolutely love. It’s not bulky at all and gives the phone a lot of protection. I’ve dropped it a few times and not a scratch on my phone when you pair it with a tempered glass screen protector. The design imo looks great. These cases tend to sell out so instead of waiting when the phone is released and having to wait a while before they restock I decided to get it out the way and buy one. Would def. recommend
customer_reviews.author: Edm179

customer_reviews.title: Drop proof iPhone case.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite iPhone case. It’s stylish, slim, and most importantly super protective. Paired with a glass screen protector it keeps my phone looking like new. I have dropped my phone multiple times from different heights, landing on all angles, and have not had a dent, chip, or break. The protection provided is unbelievable. It also stays nice and doesn’t scuff. What looks like a scuff disappears by just rubbing the case. Awesome
customer_reviews.author: ECW

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Received this case last Wednesday in anticipation of getting my new iphone X. I had read the reviews however they had been posted before the X came out so I have to assume they were bogus however I went ahead and bought this case. The case is a great fit, feels nice and generally does not take away from the wonderful form of the case. Well worth the money and seems to be a quality product. Time will tell
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Solid choice for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Case sits well, just shy of flush with the camera so you can set it down however and won’t mess with the lens. Fell from my shoulder to the concrete, no blemishes or anything. Which is kind of suspicious, like tf, did these people pay the concrete to not break my phone when it hit? Like what does concrete even need. How do you pay them? Asking for a friend
customer_reviews.author: MandaPanda

customer_reviews.title: Won't Disappoint
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through a lot of cases and I have to say Spigen cases have been my favorite. I like how the case covers the back but also protects the front incase your phone falls on its front side which is very likely it can. This case has taken a couple beatings already and my phone is still unfazed :) plus it's stylish, slim, good grip on your phone, not slippery like other cases, easy to remove. Great case would Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eliaz

customer_reviews.title: Seems they fixed it
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were all over the map. My case arrived, and I had both the screen protector and case installed in minutes. The camera bump seems fine, the speaker holes at the bottom are even, the buttons all operate (better) - all good. Many reviews touted the Spiegen cases and now I agree. Only thing is, I wish it were a bit rougher and more grippy. My last case had more texturing molded into the case. This is the only alteration I would make. Otherwise, really, really satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Malik7x

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, fits iPhone XS, not that grippy, back opening showing the Apple symbol is my only complaint
customer_reviews.text: It is really great, but as others have mentioned, it is not that grippy. However, a really strong grip would make it difficult to retrieve out of pockets (from my previous experience with grippier cases). It fits my iPhone XS (American model) and the case seems to be correctly fitted over the cameras in the back. Only complaint is that the back has a circular opening for the Apple symbol. I'm not sure why this is necessary and it just "interrupts" the overall design of the phone case. But oh well....
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Near perfect
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking case. All buttons are accessible and easy to press. Perfect fit for my iPhone X. I can’t verify drop protection because I haven’t dropped my phone yet. The only issue I have is the sides of the case are a bit slippery though not as slippery as the bare phone. It should have been easy for Spigen to press some grooves into the sides of the case for a more secure grip.
customer_reviews.author: Bob's Your Uncle

customer_reviews.title: Great Case!
customer_reviews.text: I've had several of these cases on different phones. They've all been excellent cases. This one is no exception. The fit is perfect. The finish is kind of slick but not "slippery". And the ridge on the front is just high enough to protect the screen if you lay it face down but not so high that it's obtrusive. It also seems quite durable and should protect the phone quite well in case of a drop. Highly recommended case.
customer_reviews.author: D.Fortier

customer_reviews.title: Twelve dollar case to protect twelve-hundred dollar phone
customer_reviews.text: Third different style phone I’ve used this type of case. Nice feel in hand, attractive, protective when dropped with previous phones. After a year of popping the case on and off with a previous iPhone Plus it would pop off at the corner when dropped, but never had any damage—the iPhone X seems to fit very snug and since it works with wireless charging there is no need to take it off.
customer_reviews.author: John R Gentil

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed with this purchase. This case does not fit the iPhone X. I would like to get either a refund or a replacement case that actually fits an iPhone X. I do not live in the US and so it is difficult for me to return the item. I usually base my purchases on the “Amazon Choice “ statement which was misleading in this case! ( no pun intended).
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. De Nobriga

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case and not overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This is a great “standard” type case. It’s very affordable and it looks, feels, and fits great. My problem in searching for cases was that EVERYTHING is $40+ at any retail location. I was searching for something cheap to hold me over until I could find something I really loved. This case definitely fit the bill, and to be honest, I really like it and may just keep it.
customer_reviews.author: seanie sedan

customer_reviews.title: SLEEK & SEXY CASE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this case for the iPhone X! Just what I was looking for in terms of protection and overall aesthetics to compliment my new phone. Easy to install and take out without fear of breaking anything. Does not slip easily in your hand(s), which is a MAJOR PLUS! Lastly, I love the slim design, avoiding unnecessary bulkiness while carrying in your pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: No protection
customer_reviews.text: Put this on an iPhone X. Fit was perfect. I dropped it a couple times in the house with no damage. Yesterday I dropped it about 3 feet onto the garage concrete floor. It landed flat on the back. I removed the case and found the iPhone back has completely shattered. No protection. Bad choice of a case for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: Great case! I've always been a fan of Spigen cases - they are sleek and reliable. I ordered this case prior to my iPhone X arriving and immediately put it on once I unboxed my iPhone X. The carbon fiber top & bottom make it unique and neat. Wireless charging works perfectly fine so far. The case doesn't intrude any useable screen space (it slightly covers the front of the phone) but still offers good front and back protection. Overall great price for a great case!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, durable, slim profile
customer_reviews.text: I had a case that was 3x as expensive on this phone that didn’t last nearly as long as this one. I decided to give this one a chance when the other one started to fall apart, and I’ve had it for a decently long time and haven’t noticed any structural wear and tear. It’s also got as slim a profile as you could ask for in a sturdy case, which is very important to me.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse

customer_reviews.title: One year in - very impressed...
customer_reviews.text: I use this case on an iPhone Xs and it fits like a glove. It is extremely durable and I have dropped my phone dozens of times in the past year with zero damage to my phone. The case itself looks brand new, the black hasn't faded or cracked in any way. Overall, I'm quite satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Veritas

customer_reviews.title: Great case, I got three cases when I got ...
customer_reviews.text: Great case, I got three cases when I got my iPhone X and I seem to keep coming back to this one. Adds enough protection without to much bulk. Also if you are used to using an iPhone 8 Plus and upgradeded to the iPhone X This case is good because it makes the phone feel a bit bigger In the hand, my only complaint is that keys and things like that scuff it pretty easy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Already dropped the phone a few times without a problem...
customer_reviews.text: I just spent $1,100 on the iPhone XS and I've learned that to have reliable fall protection, the case has to have some heft or it won't do the job. What I really like about this case is that I feel it provides similar protection to the two-piece Otter cases I've owned in the past but with less bulk. It's solid and feels like it will last as long as the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Poor screen protection
customer_reviews.text: Does not offer enough screen protection. iPhone Xs was dropped from only 2 feet and cracked the display! Problem is the raised lip of the case is (a) not high enough and (b) made from rubber that is too soft. So that was a $279 bill I didn't plan on. Back to an Otterbox case.
customer_reviews.author: G. Abernathy

customer_reviews.title: The fit is perfect.  Cut-outs have the room to accept 3rd party Lightning connectors.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice case at this price point. The fit is perfect. Cut-outs are perfect with plenty of room to accept 3rd party Lightning connectors. The case material can a little slippery, if too grippy it won't slide into a pocket, so it's a careful balance. This is my fourth Spigen case and they continue to deliver quality and consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Doug6ft3

customer_reviews.title: Great protection, easy to handle, allows different cables.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case. Feels good on my hand(s). Not too bulky but I feel like my phone has enough protection. I even dropped my phone face down and in the past, my “glass protector” would surely be cracked by the fall. This case has a slight raise where the glass is and that gave enough protection. GLASS SAVED!!! Charging cable is not blocked. Plus the midnight blue color was pretty cool. Not quite black and darker than a navy blue. SWEET!!! 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Garry D

customer_reviews.title: Bought it about 5 months ago and its still great.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a good while and I have to say its a great phone case. It looks kinda manly but I like it now its pretty simplistic and I've dropped my phone a few times in the bathroom and no scratches or cracks! It kind of still looks brand new actually... great case for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Bishop

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone case, it’s very stylish and easy to clean. It’s reliable and durable. I’ll admit I’ve dropped my phone a few times, and it’s never broke with this case. And the case still looks good as new ( and I’ve had it for almost 2 years 😳). I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Fit Perfect the iPhone XS
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this case with the iPhone XS and let me clarify that it does fit perfectly. Contrary to other reviewers this case look super nice and look like will protect the iPhone very good. The bottom holes are made for the iPhone X so, that is why the cuts look different in one side of the XS but looks completely fine to me. I do recommend this case for the X and XS.
customer_reviews.author: Randy•R

customer_reviews.title: The case went on easily and fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The case went on easily and fits perfectly! It has a good feel to it; it feels secure and non-slippery in the hand and has a pleasant texture. The phone will now sit flush on a flat surface thanks to the case extending past the camera on the back. And there's a small but noticeable lip on the front to protect the phone in case it falls on its face. Pushing the side buttons feels really good too and they are completely responsive. I definitely love this case and would buy one again!
customer_reviews.author: Chris McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, but hard to hold on to
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good looking case from my favorite phone case/screen protector brand but it does not feel as secure as other spigen cases I own, I lose grip easily on it and I don't feel safe dropping it. On the other hand I have dropped my iphone onto asphalt and concrete in the spigen tough armor case many times and while it has a few dings in it my phone does not have a scratch so I would not recommend for permanent use but it is still a great looking case.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this case with it's current design:
customer_reviews.text: This is a lazy implementation of the iPhone 7/8 case. It just looks sloppy with the camera lens being cut out and nothing was done to the design to 'make it flow' (like put carbon fiber around the camera lens cutout OR SOMETHING). The functional design is spot on. It will provide great protection. I would look at another one of Spigen's designed cases that don't look this sloppy. Or maybe even another manufacturer if you want to have a case with the Apple Logo showing on the back. I have opted to try this case because it covers both design and function:
customer_reviews.author: Jouten Zennousha

customer_reviews.title: Looks great; ZERO protection
customer_reviews.text: Worst case I have ever owned. Looks great on the phone, but when my iPhone X fell three feet on half tile/ half carpet, the entire screen shattered. The edge of the phone also cracked. Three feet! This phone case may look nice, but it offers zero actual protection. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: ExTex

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Product exactly as described. Fit my iPhone X perfectly. I just wish it came in more colors! I’ve dropped the phone a few times and have no cracks although I also use a screen protector so I’m not sure if it was the case, the screen protector or the combo of the 2 that saved my phone. Case isn’t too bulky and it’s easy to wipe clean.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Brewer

customer_reviews.title: but it's already a favorite case among all the prior iPhone cases that I've ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this case on for a few days, but it's already a favorite case among all the prior iPhone cases that I've had. It's very slim, but feels solid. Had a pretty decent grip feel in the hand. It feels a bit more slick that I thought it would, but seems to stick to surfaces really well and not slide around much, so that's great! All-in-all, I'll probably order another Spigen if I ever need a new case. I don't see any need for one anytime soon though because this case is rugged!
customer_reviews.author: Brett Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Happy Buyer
customer_reviews.text: This is my first phone case from Spigen. It is a really good fit and I like how it feels in my hand. It is easy to slip into my pocket and take out of my pocket. I have had it too short of a time to know of it’s durability or how well it will protect my phone. Right now, however, I would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Buyer

customer_reviews.title: minimalism & protection done the right way.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing really to dislike about this case. I’ve used lifeproof for my last two phones because I am an extremely clumsy person. Lifeproof is a good case but after getting a smaller phone it felt too bulky. I did a lot of research and the majority of people recommended Spigen products for minimalism & A+ protection. I’ve dropped the phone a handful of times (from my own clumsiness, although the case isn’t super textured for a firm grip it isn’t slippery), and it’s held up very well. Combine with a screen protector & it does the job for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly without being difficult to put on or remove. I had an Otterbox (which I will be returning) on it before receiving this one and every time I tried to take my phone out, it felt like I was going to bend it in half or break it. Plus, this case is much thinner while still protecting my phone. I also appreciate that it houses the camera rather than just having a large hole. Would definitely recommend and buy again!
customer_reviews.author: A. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Good case.
customer_reviews.text: The case fits well, it looks very nice, isn’t too big and does feel as though it would protect the phone from a decent drop. However, it does have a slight slipperiness to it. It doesn’t quite have the amount of grippiness I would prefer, but it really isn’t bad. It’s a good product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Case for iPhone X or XS
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that this case is perfect. The case is a quality case that fits the phone to perfection. I bought a case for the iPhone X over a year ago and bought another for my iPhone XS. Great product !
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my other case from another brand that was cracked and didn’t want to compromise the protection. This case is slim enough offering plenty of protection. Holds up to greasy/dirty hands from work. All side buttons fully functional. Known brand with a good product
customer_reviews.author: livef4st

customer_reviews.title: Not made for XS.
customer_reviews.text: I wish Spigen wouldn’t advertise this product as for the iPhone X and XS. The speaker/ microphone cutouts don’t bother me. It’s the camera that bothers me. As many may or may not know, the camera is moved slightly toward the middle more on the IPhone XS. Does this affect the camera quality? No not all. Does this bother me after buying it because they advertise it as for the XS? Yes it does. Somewhat disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: A great case for an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: The case worked perfectly for my iPhone Xs. Some reviews had suggested that the Spingen case wasn't a perfect for the newer iPhone X models. I don't know if changes have been made in the molds, but the one delivered to me fits and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: JAR

customer_reviews.title: Problems
customer_reviews.text: Loved it until I lost my phone. I also bought a screen protector and I dropped it when I left work. It literally shattered the screen but the case did stay in tact. After I got my phone fixed I notice the metal-like part right under the camera started to come off. I ignored it as it didn't come off completely but just bend. Honestly I have mix feelings about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Yeonhee

customer_reviews.title: Non-Intrusive and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I've always disliked having a case on my phone because it makes it feel cumbersome and ruins a lot of the original design aspects of the phone itself. That is not the case here though. It has a small enough form factor to where it compliments the phone rather than feeling like it detracts from the design of the device. That is, it is easy to hold. I have also dropped it multiple times and no damage was incurred (I work in a building with only solid concrete floors).
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Gremillion

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great protection, all the button works and the black case looks awesome. What I payed for is pretty satisfying only complaint is my iphoneX silence switch is hard to reach and it does get annoying after awhile
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Broken phone
customer_reviews.text: It did not do what it was advertised to do. 3 ft drop onto a wood floor and the back of my iPhone cracked. Defective design and company won’t cover any damage to the phone caused by the case not doing what cases are supposed to do. I would not recommend...
customer_reviews.author: ryan smith

customer_reviews.title: Great protection without the Bulk!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent low profile case for iPhone X. I use with Spingin Screen Protector. This case is smooth, doesn't catch dust or dirt and is low profile which I like. If you hate BULKY cases then this is for you at a great price. Buttons easily accessible and fits great in your hand. Great coverage with great protection!
customer_reviews.author: dantheman

customer_reviews.title: So much for “Rugged Armor.”
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel and design of this product and it’s held up fine so far, but gave it 1 star because my back glass cracked. I’ve had the phone for 2.5 years and always keep it in a case. Yes, I occasionally drop it but nothing major. I just replaced a cracked screen protector - when I took off the case I found my back glass was cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M

customer_reviews.title: No problems here !
customer_reviews.text: This case is awesome ! I have dropped my iPhone X a bunch of times . And from different heights . Let’s just say this case protects my phone great . I read many reviews about it not working and the screen cracks or something else but I haven’t had my screen crack or anything . I would recommend this to anyone . It is also slim fitting and snug . But it does protect the phone .
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Simple. protective, great feel, looks great, and showcases the apple logo. Picky with my cases and love this one.
customer_reviews.text: Simple. protective, great feel, looks great, and showcases the apple logo. Picky with my cases and love this one. Even just purchased this same case for the iPhone x.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: The slim-designed case has great protection on all the sides
customer_reviews.text: The slim-designed case has great protection on all the sides. Perfect fit even with a thin metal plate installed for my vehicle mount (I don't use the wireless charging capabilities, so no problems there). The only reason I didn't give it a 5star rating is that I wish the sides had a little more grip on them, I'm sure that over time they will not be so smooth. But as usual, ​Spigen has made a high-quality case!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Thayer

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the Otter box! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, nice grip and has a good bevel to protect the screen. Dropped several times and still going strong! Had the Otterbox Symmetry series. Dropped it once and the screen cracked because the case is slippery cause it’s made of hard plastic and cost more than twice than this model!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Case
customer_reviews.text: Of all the cases I own, this Spiegen Rugged Armor is the best. I have been using it for over a year and it protects the phone great. I've dropped my phone so many time's and the case takes the impact well. I love it so much that I recommend it to all my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Hesh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and appears to be very protective for normal use and occasional drops. I also purchased and installed a glass screen protector, so they should provide the protection I need.
customer_reviews.author: ronworley

customer_reviews.title: Love this Case
customer_reviews.text: I had a really slim case for my iPhone X that didn't provide enough protection. After having to replace the front glass I went looking for another case and found this Spigen case. I love the case. It offers great protection for the whole phone an it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Back of phone broke INSIDE the case.
customer_reviews.text: Spigen has never let me down, but this case wasn’t it. Phone broke inside of the case. The drop wasn’t even bad and I never noticed until someone pointed it out one day.
customer_reviews.author: Ramiro

customer_reviews.title: Spigen always impresses
customer_reviews.text: Case is exactly what I was looking for. Fits extremely well and should provide some decent protection in case of a drop. I love the phone without a case, but was concerned with how slippery the phone is being all glass. This case is not bulky at all and has a great texture (for lack of a better term) to it. I have noticed wireless charging has slowed down since putting the case on but this is expected somewhat because the phone would be further away from the charge coils. This isn't enough to lower a star though. Very happy with this case.
customer_reviews.author: Joel E Charbonneau

customer_reviews.title: feels better in the hand and is not as bulky
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and an Otterbox Commuter simultaneously. I chose this one over the Otterbox, feels better in the hand and is not as bulky. Have dropped my phone several times now since Dec 2017 and still has kept phone and screen protected. Can't beat the price and protection.
customer_reviews.author: Blackb1rd

customer_reviews.title: Best value and actual protection
customer_reviews.text: Best value for the price. Not quite as protective as the Nuguard KX cases, but way less money, and available through Amazon Prime as I was in a hurry to get a case for my new X. This case should be good for most below the neck drop heights.
customer_reviews.author: anomaly7

customer_reviews.title: Slim yet durable. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually write reviews but for this I had to. I live this!! It perfect for me as it’s slim and fit comfortably on my hand while providing durable protection against accidental drop.
customer_reviews.author: Mirza

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good-looking case for iPhone XS
customer_reviews.text: Good-looking case that seems to provide excellent protection. Buttons work well, and screen is protected by lip. The only slight problem is that the speaker holes at the bottom are not precisely fitted to the iPhone XS. But that is a minor issue and functionally, it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: This is a great case. I ordered a competitors case previously
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case. I ordered a competitors case previously. It was well rated but would do nothing more than protect from scratches. It was super thin and would have been worthless protecting the phone from a drop. The Spigen is a perfect combination of low profile but will still protect the phone if dropped. And a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: chad777

customer_reviews.title: Nice case!!!
customer_reviews.text: This case fits the phone perfectly. Buttons the sides are as easy to use with the case on as it is with the case off. I replaced another case which was veeey difficult to use the buttons with this case. Much, much better!!! Smooth, matte blue backing. Slides into pocket easily.
customer_reviews.author: Trev

customer_reviews.title: Favorite phone case
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite phone case. I am very happy with this purchase. My fiancé told me that he also wanted one because it looks great and protects my phone. It is overall a really great phone case.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Negrillo

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect, looks great on my iPhone X. Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Great case. I bought this because I had the exact same one for my iPhone 7 and it protects from drops and also protects the front glass if you put it face down. Fits perfection my X, good looking case.
customer_reviews.author: Sean P.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Design Won
customer_reviews.text: This case exceeded my expectations. The sleek design and curvature around the edges are supreme. The color fits the description perfectly. I did a comparison with a caseology case and the final decision was the spigen. My only drawback was the back center logo cutout is exposed without a protective covering, which is why I gave it 4⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Instead of 5. I returned the caseology case.
customer_reviews.author: L. Craft

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: Not slippery, feels durable... have had it only for weeks... but loved the case . Not too bulky, all the buttons accessible. Over a month now.... i am still happy
customer_reviews.author: Vava

customer_reviews.title: Rugged Without Being Too Bulky
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my new iPhone X! Easy to put on. Hugs my phone and protects the camera’s lenses. Thick enough but not too bulky. Only disappointment is that the midnight blue is so dark, it looks black (about like my new car).
customer_reviews.author: FencePpl

customer_reviews.title: It is slim yet offers good all around protection
customer_reviews.text: I have a few iPhone X cases, but this one always finds its way back to my iPhone X. It is slim yet offers good all around protection. So far I have only had one drop with my iPhone X and nothing happened to my phone.
customer_reviews.author: StanfordMoore

customer_reviews.title: Great Case and Value
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic case and has done a great job of protecting the phone. Looks great and the material has a good amount of grip. It has a bit of weight to it, but it also feels solid and durable. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thicker than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I like having a flexible and slim phone case so it doesn't add much bulk to the phone. I had this same case for my 7 Plus which is why I got it again. I like it but the case seems thicker than before which I liked how slim it felt on my 7 Plus. I know the X is slightly thicker than the 7 as well but the actual case feels thicker too. Wireless charging does work while the case is on which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Case is very slippery
customer_reviews.text: The case is nice, thick and looks like it would be very durable but it's very slippery. With the thickness of the case and being slippery, the phone slipped out of my hand few times already. I would not recommend or buy this case again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Support Spigen
customer_reviews.text: I haven't received my pre-ordered iPhone X yet but I'm sure it will fit fine on the phone. I trust in all Spigen products because they make a great quality built product. I currently have this style case on my iPhone 7plus amongst other cases for my family's phones as well. The only thing I wish for this case is if they made more colors besides the black and navy blue. I really enjoy this case. I would definitely recommend this case and company.
customer_reviews.author: Ismael Matias

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I dropped my phone several times and this provided great protection. Easy to hold and does not pick up dust like some other silicone covers.
customer_reviews.author: James Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Reliable brand
customer_reviews.text: I lease my iPhones and I always look for a brand to support my iPhone cause last thing I wanna do is break the screen and replace which is a waste of time and money so I place my faith in this brand and they have never failed me but I also buy a screen protector
customer_reviews.author: Samuel P

customer_reviews.title: Good Product - not Bulky but not Slim
customer_reviews.text: Good quality case that protects my phone which has been dropped several times since purchase. Not the slimmest case out there but I don't think those slim cases provide much protection. This is a good compromise providing a decent amount of protection in a case that's not terribly bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Mull

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Had this case for a while now and it still looks new. Dropped my phone a bunch of times and this case definitely saved it from breaking. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny Shtivelman

customer_reviews.title: It’s slim enough and looks nice. Has a hole for the apple logo to ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s slim enough and looks nice. Has a hole for the apple logo to be seen. The reason I don’t have 5 stars is because the backing is very slippery. Phone falls out of hand a lot and I can’t prop the phone up like in the past with my old phone and phone case. I tried so hard to find a phone case like my old one and didn’t have much luck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit's my iPhone XS Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought an iPhone XS in April of 2019 and this case fit perfectly. No issues with the camera positioning. It's a snug fit and overall a nice case. I've had it two weeks so far and I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bristow

customer_reviews.title: Durable thin phone case
customer_reviews.text: Highly durable and extra thin phone case, maybe the best phone case for the price range. Feels soft on the touch and it doesn't loose shape
customer_reviews.author: Django

customer_reviews.title: Slim and nice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those who don’t constantly drop their phone all day and are smart enough to get the glass screen protector. It’s protection without getting bulky. Very nice after two months so far. I’ll still make my wife buy the otter box though!
customer_reviews.author: Seahawks Dad

customer_reviews.title: Fits iPhone XS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have the apple leather case but wanted something more robust for ratchet activities. I'm a long term Spigen case user, but was hesitant to purchase with all the reviews about this being compatible with the X but not the XS. I can't comment if the XS camera position/size is different than the X, but i can confirm that THIS CASE FITS THE XS. My guess is that maybe some of the late September 2018 reviewers received an old batch or something but i ordered mine like 2 days ago and it fits as described. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Durden

customer_reviews.title: Buttons just a bit off
customer_reviews.text: This is good, but the buttons on the side of the iphone sometimes dont quite register because of the fit being just milimeters off. It's not a big inconvenience unless you spend your whole day screen shottting. Overall, pretty decent.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Case is junk. Dropped my phone on the back and it cracked. $1000 phone is trashed and the drop wasn’t that bad m.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: Can't really complain with this one. If you want a simple, well-made case then this is the one for you. I've had it for a while and no issues yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amil

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Been a fan of this company until now
customer_reviews.text: Protects the outside but left scratches on the side of my iPhone X. Very disappointed. Been a fan of this company until now.
customer_reviews.author: Kieff Baluyot

customer_reviews.title: I loved the case for my iPhone X
customer_reviews.text: I loved the case for my iPhone X. Nice tight fit, easy to install, and improved the grip on the $1000 iPhone. The reason I gave it only 3 stars is due to the delivery. I paid an extra $5.95 for one day delivery, but the case came 3 days after placing my order. Disappointed in the delivery service.
customer_reviews.author: J.Pimentel

customer_reviews.title: Best choice for iPhone case
customer_reviews.text: Spigen makes the best Apple product cases . I love the slim look it’s not bulky .the prices can’t be beat for the product either
customer_reviews.author: Cedric barnes

customer_reviews.title: the outerbox pushed my glass up and looked like a brick on my iPhone X this worked great ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 protectors this and an outerbox, the outerbox pushed my glass up and looked like a brick on my iPhone X this worked great with the glass and is very sturdy, great price too
customer_reviews.author: Michael Patrone

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: A well made, no nonsense case that i expect to work just fine. I'd have given it 5 stars, but it's a little boring. The same product in colors other than black would have been a home run. purchased along with a tempered glass overlay from the same company. fits perfect. does have enough of a beveled front to keep display off surface even with the glass front.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Potts

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This case is lightweight and easy to put on and take off. So far so good in terms of protecting my phone, but I would prefer something a little more rigid.
customer_reviews.author: Working Mom
